title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the target audience, key features, and desired outcomes.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, data flow, integration points, and infrastructure considerations. Ensure scalability, maintainability, and security best practices are addressed.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the system, including the user experience and interaction flows.

title: Implement Cognitive Age Assessment
description: Develop the algorithms and models for assessing cognitive age based on user data and inputs.

title: Develop Intervention Recommendation Engine
description: Implement the logic and algorithms for recommending personalized interventions based on the cognitive age assessment.

title: Set up Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management system for user data, assessment results, and intervention recommendations.

title: Implement Security and Privacy Measures
description: Ensure the system adheres to security and privacy best practices, including data encryption, access controls, and compliance with relevant regulations.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application.

title: Develop Testing Strategy and Automation
description: Create a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit, integration, and end-to-end testing, and implement automated testing frameworks.

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, including technical documentation, user guides, and training materials.
